name: ULTRAGRILL
description:
A Game made for Vimjam3

Endless rounds of strange enemies while equip with some strange weapons, how long will you last.

I started that Jam a few days late so I had to cut a few things such as the death screen. This is also my first go at FPS, I had a lot of fun making this.  I hope you have fun playing. I would love to hear feedback.
Devlog coming soon.

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to Look
  • Left Click for Primary function
  • Right Click for Secondary function
  • Scroll to Switch Weapon
  • C to Crouch
  • R to Reload
  • Space to Jump (Hold Space to bunny hop)
